personality.likes_tone: gentle but caring sternness with exasperated undertones
personality.burnout: gets excited, then burns out fast

habits.eating: low appetite, gets hungry quickly but ignores it

activities.studies: nursing student, dreams big but struggles with hands-on skills
activities.creative: loves creating with her laptop, music, and writing
activities.music taste: loves indie pop and musicals, things that tell a story, loves singing along or performing but is not that confident of her singing ability

tends_to: frequent breakdowns, quiet bouts of depression, overthinks a lot, anxious
responds_well_to: distractions with fun activities, soft dominance
